channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish on verge and in bushes, 25th October
item.description:
An amount of flytipping (pillows and plastic tubs) plus more general litter in bushes on junction of Hesters Way Rd and Oldbury and up alleyway to side of 40-50 Oldbury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Oldbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Asbestos gutters, 25th October
item.description:
Flytipped asbestos gutters

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obscured views, 25th October
item.description:
Trees hanging into dog lane obscure view on bend. Dangerous as lane used by walkers, cyclists, horse riders and vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree hanging into road, 25th October
item.description:
Trees hanging into and narrowing lane

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Masons Cottages Dog Lane, Witcombe

item.title: Dog Lane, 25th October
item.description:
Trees, brambles hanging into road. Also large amounts of soil on road blocking drains and causing skid risk

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Masons Cottages Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked footpath, 25th October
item.description:
Footpath blocked by brambles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White Towers Dog Lane, Witcombe

item.title: Open Reach Cabinets, 25th October
item.description:
All of the Open Teach ( BY) cabinets at the junction of Montpellier Spa Road with Montpellier Parade have been covered in graffiti

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Montpellier Parade, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes!, 25th October
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road just past Upper Hill Farm and into the trees. Potholes have opened up on the road effectively on the track a car has to take and little option in avoiding hitting the potholes. Please cam thes be repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Edge of road at a passing place badly eroded, 25th October
item.description:
The location is on the Cleeve Common Road just up from a the burnt oak where there is a passing place. On the right hand side going towards the common the road has badly and deeply eroded. Having been caught twice at this point - my vehicle actually grounded on the first occasion and luckily no damage. Please can this be repaired and other edges of this road filled in where vehicles have no option but to run onto the side of the road to pass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deepening Potholes and more of them, 25th October
item.description:
This area is effectively one big pothole! About 20 yards of road are just one pothole after the other. Quite a lot of traffic use this road and damage to tyres are a distinct possibility. Please can the area be repaired!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Byron Road Paving slabs crashed and loose giving 2 inch edge of a trip hazard, 25th October
item.description:
Paving slabs crashed and loose giving 2 inch edge of a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 53 Byron Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Lamppost 37 not working, 21st October
item.description:
Opposite 91 Caernarvon road. The streetlight is not working for some time now. It’s number 37. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tyre, 21st October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown

item.title: Road gulley drain blocked, 20th October
item.description:
This gulley drain has been blocked for years. The road around it floods during periods of rain. Simply needs cleaning out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
